description: React component 'Courses' that fetches and displays a list of courses from a database using Supabase, with filtering by 'pathId'. It manages loading and error states, and provides navigation to individual course pages.

methods.name: Courses({ pathId })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of courses, fetches data on mount, and handles user interactions for opening courses.

methods.name: openCourse
methods.description: Function used to navigate to the course detail page when 'Open Course' button is clicked.
